item.title: DoKC Operator SIG Update
item.description: Before our meeting, we started with a question to begin the morning: What board game or tabletop game have you played that you would recommend to others? Itamar Marom suggests that Catan as a good board game, which takes a lot of time, super annoying when you lose, but generally a lot of fun. So highly suggested! Other members like Hugh Lashbrooke and Robert Hodges prefer Monopoly, where you must reach a higher level of monopoly awareness to enjoy it fully.
